Key Match Events: The Arizona Diamondbacks won the National League pennant
The Diamondbacks swept the Philadelphia Phillies in the National League Championship Series
Pre-Game Insights: Many did not pick the Diamondbacks to beat the Philadelphia Phillies
The Diamondbacks had the worst record of any team in the postseason field
Post-Match Reflections: The Diamondbacks have consistently defied the expectations set for them
The Diamondbacks' journey has been remarkable and could be even better than their 2001 World Series run
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game dates for this year's World Series are the same as in 2001
The Diamondbacks are made up of mostly youngsters with a team active roster payroll of around $70 million
Others: The Diamondbacks had to come back from a 2-0 deficit in the series
The Diamondbacks' manager Torey Lovullo wanted to make sure that Chris Russo, a public doubter, did not cheat his way out of retiring
